TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LocalClientSecuritySettings extends System.Object

summary.span: 指定本機用戶端的安全性設定。

span.span: Specifies local client security settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別包含 (以及從它衍生的類別) 用來建立安全性通道的本機安全性設定。This class contains the local security settings used by the (and classes derived from it) to build the security channel. 這些是用戶端的本機設定，而且不是由服務的安全性原則所決定。These settings are local to the client and are not determined from the service's security policy. ## Examples 在這個範例中，會示範 類別的用法。This example shows how to use the class. MemberSignature.Value: public: property int CookieRenewalThresholdPercentage { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.CookieRenewalThresholdPercentage : int with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定更新安全對話 Cookie 的臨界百分比。

span.span: Gets or sets the threshold percentage for renewal of secure conversation cookies.

value.span: 更新安全對談 Cookie 的臨界百分比。

span.span: The threshold percentage for renewing secure conversation cookies.

value.span: 預設為 60%。

span.span: The default is 60 percent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用戶端會快取安全對話 Cookie，而且當已快取的 Cookie 快要過期時，用戶端會自動從服務取得新的 Cookie。The client caches secure conversation cookies and when a cached cookie is going to expire in the near future, the client automatically gets a new cookie from the service. 這個屬性的值會決定已快取之 Cookie 的有效期間必須已超過多少百分比，才可以取得新的 Cookie。The value of this property determines what percentage of the cached cookie's validity period must be over before getting a new cookie. 例如，如果這個屬性的值是 60，而且用戶端有一個有效期為 100 分鐘的安全對話 Cookie，這時用戶端會重複使用該快取的 Cookie，過了 60 分鐘之後，再從服務取得新的 Cookie。For example, if the value of this property is 60, and the client has a secure conversation cookie that is valid for 100 minutes, it reuses the cached cookie for 60 minutes, after which it gets a new cookie from the service. ## Examples 這個範例會說明如何設定 `CookieRenewalThresholdPercentage` 成員。This example shows how to set the `CookieRenewalThresholdPercentage` member. [!code-csharp[S_UELocalClientSecuritySettings#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalclientsecuritysettings/cs/program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[S_UELocalClientSecuritySettings#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalclientsecuritysettings/vb/program.vb#3)]

exception.span: 這個屬性設為小於 0 或大於 100 的值。

span.span: The property is to a value less than 0 or greater than 100.

span.span: Gets or sets the identity verifier.

value.span: 實作抽象類別 之實作的執行個體。

span.span: An instance of an implementation of the abstract class .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是用來確認正在與用戶端通道通訊的遠端端點是否符合指定於 的身分識別，也就是通道所設定通訊的目標。This property is used to verify that the remote endpoint that the client channel is communicating with matches the identity specified in the that the channel is targeted for. ## Examples 這個範例會說明如何傳回抽象類別之實作的執行個體。This example shows how to return an instance of an implementation of the abstract class. summary.span: 取得或設定通訊雙方系統時鐘之間可允許的最大時間差異。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum allowable time difference between the system clocks of the two parties that are communicating.

value.span: ，表示通訊雙方系統時鐘之間的最大允許時間差異。

span.span: A that represents the maximum allowable time difference between the system clocks of the two parties that are communicating.

value.span: 預設值是 5 分鐘。

span.span: The default is 5 minutes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果系統之間時鐘差異超過這個屬性指定值，則系統彼此間傳遞的訊息會被拒絕。Messages between systems whose clocks' difference exceeds the value specified in this property are rejected. 這個屬性會配合訊息時間戳記驗證和 屬性一起使用。This property is used in conjunction with the message time stamp verification and the property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 設定最大時鐘誤差](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-set-a-max-clock-skew.md)。For more information, see [How to: Set a Max Clock Skew](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-set-a-max-clock-skew.md). ## Examples 這個範例會示範如何取得 值。This example shows how to get the value. summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出安全性工作階段是否會在傳輸失敗之後嘗試重新連線。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether security sessions attempt to reconnect after transport failures.

value.span: 如果安全性工作階段會在傳輸失敗之後嘗試重新連線，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if security sessions attempt to reconnect after transport failures; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個旗標設定為 `true`，表示用戶端會嘗試透過多個傳輸連線來傳送對應至單一安全性工作階段的訊息。If this flag is set to `true`, the client tries to send messages that correspond to a single security session over multiple transport connections. 用戶端會在先前連線失敗時建立新的傳輸連線。It establishes a new transport connection if the previous connection fails. 這種設定對於安全 WS-ReliableMessaging 而言相當有用，因為用戶端會要求工作階段能夠容忍暫時的傳輸失敗。This is useful in the case of secure WS-ReliableMessaging because the client requires the session to tolerate transient transport failures. ## Examples 這個範例會說明如何取得值，並由這個值指出安全性工作階段是否會在傳輸失敗之後嘗試重新連線。This example shows how to get a value that indicates whether security sessions attempt to reconnect after transport failures. [!code-csharp[S_UELocalClientSecuritySettings#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalclientsecuritysettings/cs/program.cs#8)] [!code-vb[S_UELocalClientSecuritySettings#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalclientsecuritysettings/vb/program.vb#8)]

summary.span: 取得或設定用於偵測重新執行攻擊之已快取 Nonce 數目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of cached nonces used for replay detection.

value.span: 用於偵測重新執行的已快取 Nonce 數目。

span.span: The number of cached nonces used for replay detection.
The default is 900000.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A *nonce*是 「 數字使用一次 」，通常用於一種驗證通訊協定，以確保舊通訊無法使用在攻擊中，透過使用重新執行一個隨機數字。A *nonce* is a "number used once", often a random number used in an authentication protocol to ensure that old communications cannot be used in an attack by using replays. 如果超過 Nonce 計數，傳入訊息就會遭到拒絕並擲回 。If the nonce count is exceeded, the incoming message is rejected and a is thrown. 舊的 Nonce 會及時移除。Old nonces are removed in a timely manner. ## Examples 這個範例會說明如何取得用於重新執行偵測的快取 Nonce 數量。This example shows how to get the number of cached nonces to use for replay detection. [!code-csharp[S_UELocalClientSecuritySettings#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalclientsecuritysettings/cs/program.cs#9)] [!code-vb[S_UELocalClientSecuritySettings#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalclientsecuritysettings/vb/program.vb#9)]

value.span: 預設為五分鐘。

span.span: The default is five minutes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A *nonce*是 「 數字使用一次 」，通常用於一種驗證通訊協定，以確保舊通訊無法使用在攻擊中，透過使用重新執行一個隨機數字。A *nonce* is a "number used once", often a random number used in an authentication protocol to ensure that old communications cannot be used in an attack by using replays. ## Examples 這個範例會說明如何取得這個屬性。This example shows how to get this property. summary.span: 取得或設定啟動器會在這段時間之後為安全性工作階段更新金鑰的時間範圍。

span.span: Gets or sets the time span after which the initiator renews the key for the security session.

value.span: ，表示啟動器會在這段時間之後為安全性工作階段更新金鑰的時間範圍。

span.span: A that represents the time span after which the initiator renews the key for the security session.

value.span: 預設為 10 小時。

span.span: The default is 10 hours.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作階段設定 (例如這個設定) 適用於下列任何一種狀況：Session settings such as this one are applicable under any of the following conditions: - 和 的所有用戶端認證類型。All client credential types for and . - 如果[ \ 項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b)已啟用。If [\ element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b) is enabled. - 如果[ \ 項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b)未啟用，在具有 = `true`或是 = `true`。If [\ element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b) is not enabled, on with = `true` or = `true`. 工作階段設定 (例如這個設定) 不適用於下列任何一種狀況：Session settings such as this one are not applicable under any of the following conditions: - 針對 。For . - 針對 。For . - 如果[ \ 項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b)未啟用，在具有 = `true`或都未屬性設為`true`。If [\ element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b) is not enabled, on with = `true` or with none of the properties set to `true`. ## Examples 這個範例會說明如何取得這個屬性。This example shows how to get this property. summary.span: 取得或設定前一個工作階段金鑰在金鑰更新期間對傳入訊息屬有效的時間間隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the time interval for which the previous session key is valid on incoming messages during a key renewal.

value.span: ，表示前一個工作階段金鑰在金鑰更新之後對傳入訊息屬有效的時間間隔。

span.span: A that represents the time interval for which the previous session key is valid on incoming messages after a key renewal.

value.span: 預設值是 5 分鐘。

span.span: The default is 5 minutes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在金鑰更新之後，用戶端和伺服器都必須使用最新的可用金鑰來傳送訊息。After key renewal, the client and the server should always send messages using the most current available key. 雙方都會接受由前一個工作階段金鑰保護的傳入訊息，直到變換時間逾期。Both parties can accept incoming messages secured with the previous session key until the rollover time expires. 工作階段設定 (例如這個設定) 適用於下列任何一種狀況：Session settings such as this one are applicable under any of the following conditions: - 和 的所有用戶端認證類型。All client credential types for and . - 如果[ \ 項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b)已啟用。If [\ element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b) is enabled. - 如果[ \ 項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b)未啟用，在具有 = `true`或是 = `true`。If [\ element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b) is not enabled, on with = `true` or = `true`. 工作階段設定 (例如這個設定) 不適用於下列任何一種狀況：Session settings such as this one are not applicable under any of the following conditions: - 針對 。For . - 針對 。For . - 如果[ \ 項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b)未啟用，在具有 = `true`或都未屬性設為`true`。If [\ element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b) is not enabled, on with = `true` or with none of the properties set to `true`. ## Examples 這個範例會說明如何取得這個屬性。This example shows how to get this property. summary.span: 取得或設定用戶端所傳送訊息有效的最長持續時間。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum duration that the messages are valid when sent by the client.

summary.span: 如果服務在這段期間之後收到訊息，它應該捨棄該訊息。

span.span: If a message is received by the service after this duration, it should discard the message.

value.span: ，表示用戶端所傳送訊息有效的最長持續時間。

span.span: A that represents the maximum duration that the messages are valid when sent by the client.

value.span: 預設值是 5 分鐘。

span.span: The default is 5 minutes.

remarks.format: ## Examples 這個範例會說明如何取得這個屬性。This example shows how to get this property. [!code-csharp[S_UELocalClientSecuritySettings#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalclientsecuritysettings/cs/program.cs#13)] [!code-vb[S_UELocalClientSecuritySettings#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalclientsecuritysettings/vb/program.vb#13)]

exception.span: 這個屬性設定為小於 0 的值。

span.span: The property is to a value less than 0.
